title: (x) "Jewels of Time" copperplate script - similar to Young Baroque {Stephen}
content:
I’ve visited FontFont, FontBureau, Adobe, Linotype… found many typefaces in that spirit but not exactly the same:

— Kuenstler script  
— ITC Edwardian script  
— English script  
— Palace script  
— Shelley script  
— Snell roundhand script  
— Bickham script  
— Sloop

Thanks in advance for your help.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=JewelsofTime.jpg)
author: mc

comments.content:
The shapes are the same. About the stroke contrast, strangely the ITC Young Baroque looks more even on screen.

Thanks a lot for your help, kind regards.
